english: Parks and wildlife regulations typically focus on conservation, recreational activities, and management of natural resources. SB1267 is an administrative bill that deals with the technical aspects of vessel and outboard motor ownership documentation. The bill updates procedures for title transfers and establishes rules for security interests related to these vehicles. This legislation is purely administrative in nature and does not contain any discriminatory elements targeting specific ethnic or national groups. While the bill makes changes to vessel ownership procedures, it applies equally to all residents and does not create any specific barriers or challenges for Chinese immigrants or Chinese persons in the United States. The changes in documentation requirements and procedures affect all vessel owners uniformly regardless of their national origin or ethnicity.
chinese: 公园和野生动物法规通常侧重于自然资源的保护、休闲活动和管理。SB1267是一项行政法案，涉及船只和舷外发动机所有权文件的技术方面。该法案更新了产权转让程序，并制定了与这些车辆相关的担保权益规则。这项立法纯粹是行政性质的，不包含针对特定种族或国籍群体的歧视性内容。虽然该法案对船只所有权程序进行了修改，但它平等地适用于所有居民，不会为中国移民或在美国的中国人创造任何特定的障碍或挑战。文件要求和程序的变更统一影响所有船只所有者，不论其国籍或种族背景如何。
